column2:
ggplotly(createPitch(10600, 6500, "#000000", "#FFFFFF", "#000000", "#808080") + geom_point(data = data, aes( x = (X*10000*1.2) - 1400, y = 6700 - (Y*10000*0.7), col = result, size = xG, text = paste("Situation:", situation, "
", "Result:", result,"
","Minute:", minute, "
","Date:", date, "
", "Assist:", player_assisted)) ) + coord_flip(xlim = c(5400, 10685), ylim = c(0, 7040)) + theme(plot.background = element_rect(fill = "black"), title = element_text(colour = "white"), legend.position = "none"), tooltip = 'text' )
